post:
Hello all,

IllyHosting (ILLYSOFT LLC) is a registered company located in Prishtina, Kosovo (Reg No. #811279795), we are a vps, dedicated servers, shared hosting and colocation provider, our servers are located in our own data center in Prishtina and are fully owned by us, we also provide VPS in Germany and United Kingdom (we use OVH datacenters to provide DE & UK services).

Please use coupon code: **NEWSITE** (valid until 31 May), to get 10% discount on all services* **in your first month only** (not included: Voip Refills, SSL Certificates and Domains).

**Features:**
-Developers API (Shared Hosting, VPS, Domains).
-Payment methods: Bitcoin, PayPal, Credit Card, Bank Transfer.
-Our Datacenter Location: Prishtina, Kosovo.
-VPS Locations: Kosovo, Germany, United Kingdom.
-ASN: AS207817 - ILLYSOFT, AL
-Speedtest Server: https://speedtest.illyhosting.com/
-Looking Glass: https://lg.illyhosting.com/
-Test ip: 194.5.235.3
-Test file: https://speedtest.illyhosting.com/1GB.bin
-Setup time: Instant or within 30 minutes for some orders.
-VPS Control Panel: Power control, reinstall your VPS, upload your own ISO, traffic stats, disk stats, etc.
-IPMI interface to manage dedicated servers.
-BGP session possibility for dedicated servers.
-Windows Included in VPS3-6 (Bring your own license).
-Recurring Referral Program.
-24/7 Livechat & Tickets Support.
